name: The Golden Trap
description:
Welcome to The Golden Trap

in this game you wake up to find yourself in a strange pyramid, you have to escape as quickly as possible because air is very limited and something is following you....

HOW TO PLAY:

E and Q to rotate left and right.

Point and click around the map to move.

If you hear footsteps stop or you will get caught.

GameJolt:https://gamejolt.com/games/TGT/745408

Enjoy :) #horror #adventure #survival #pointnclick #puzzle
